db:abstract.db:para: A Qt 3D QML application that implements a single-pass wireframe rendering method.

db:article.db:programlisting:
!include( ../examples.pri ) { error( "Couldn't find the examples.pri file!" ) }
QT += 3dcore 3drender 3dinput 3dquick qml quick
HEADERS += \
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
OTHER_FILES += \ main.qml \ BasicCamera.qml \ WireframeEffect.qml \ WireframeMaterial.qml \ TrefoilKnot.qml
RESOURCES += \ wireframe.qrc \ ../exampleresources/obj.qrc
